title: BRIEF-Uthealth In Houston And Athersys Announce Funding For Clinical Trial Using Multistem® To Treat Trauma Patients
text:
April 23, 2018 / 10:35 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Uthealth In Houston And Athersys Announce Funding For Clinical Trial Using Multistem® To Treat Trauma Patients Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Athersys Inc: 
* UTHEALTH IN HOUSTON AND ATHERSYS ANNOUNCE FUNDING FOR CLINICAL TRIAL USING MULTISTEM® TO TREAT TRAUMA PATIENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
